---
title: Introduction to version control with Git
description: |
  <br>This introductory course to Git will allow you to put your projects under version control, create commits with important versions of your files, revisit these versions, and add remotes on services such as GitHub or GitLab. You will get a deep understanding of Git's functioning and learn to use it from the command line.
title-block-banner: true

On Mac and Linux computers, SSH is usually pre-installed (try typing `ssh` in a terminal to make sure it is there).
